page.title: 09SCHOOL LIFE IN 1985
page.content: {Kings Glen Primary School} begins at 9.10 every morning from Monday - Friday. We all sit at desks and we have a teacher called Miss Urie. We use jotters to write in and we use pencils or pens. We use lots of books. Our teacher uses chalk to write on the blackboard. Some of the {subjects} we do are arithmetic, reading, writing, spelling, music, art, environmental studies, religious education, P.E. and our most recent acquisition is a BBC micro{computer} We have 2 intervals when we go out to play. At lunchtime some people go home, but most people have their lunch in school. The boys play football and marbles. The girls play with skipping ropes and often play at tig.
